title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained LLM runner for macOS/Linux/Windows with built-in model library and OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—chat, embed, pull, list models with 5-line code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK (npm install ollama) works in Node & browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat & embed interfaces to LangChain.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (formerly ollama-webui) with RAG, user auth, workspace folders.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama—Maven Central artifact with fluent API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping Ollama REST endpoints.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (Rust) for interactive Ollama chats with syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement for VS Code.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators & embedders.

title: ollama-codex
summary: Drop-in open-source replacement for OpenAI Codex using Ollama backend.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-sk
summary: Microsoft Semantic Kernel connector for Ollama (C#).

title: ollama-gpt-crawler
summary: Crawl any site, feed pages to Ollama for summarization/Q&A via simple CLI.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Host your own Discord bot powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of ready-to-run Modelfiles (Llama 3, Mistral, CodeLlama…).

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async HTTP and native JSON handling.
